roleset.name: keep, maintain
roleset.note: PRESERVE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'preserve' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, no Framenet entry. Comparison with 'keep' and 'maintain'. (from preserve.01-v predicate notes)
PRESERVATION-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb preserve.01, VN class defend-85. Differs from verb frame due to addition of arg3 as "thing preserved against". (from preservation.01-n)
PRESERVED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from preserved.01-j)

example.name: just transitive
example.text: Jaguar officials have indicated they are close to wrapping up a friendly alliance with GM that *trace* would preserve Jaguar's independence, but no deal has been announced.
example.arg: that -> a friendly alliance with GM

example.name: with benefactive
example.text: John preserved his extracted wisdom teeth for posterity.

example.name: Arg 1 only, arg1 in pre-nominal position
example.text: Even more interestingly , the teacher makes up lyrics about the river preservation campaign and sets them to traditional folk melodies , thus melding the old and the new .

example.name: Args 0, 1, 3.
example.text: History bears witness to churches so adamant in their preservation of traditional values against change as to make them impotent in the face of change.

example.name: With benefactive
example.text: In 1905, when few people in East Africa thought of land conservation and the preservation of wildlife for posterity, portions of the area were earmarked.
